content.text:
# Golden Goblet Award for Best Cinematography

The Golden Goblet Award for Best Cinematography () is a prize given to the films in the main category of competition at the Shanghai International Film Festival.
Award Winners
{| class="wikitable"
|-
! Year !! Film !! Cinematographer
|-
| 2002 || Life Show || Sun Ming
|-
| 2003 || no award this year ||

|-
